lead_paragraph: Rudy Gay had 25 points and nine rebounds, Seth Curry scored 17 points and the Sacramento Kings beat the Denver Nuggets 115-106 on Saturday night to sweep the three-game season series.

headline.print_headline: Gay Scores 25 Points, Kings Rally to Beat Nuggets 115-106
headline.main: Gay Scores 25 Points, Kings Rally to Beat Nuggets 115-106

snippet: Rudy Gay had 25 points and nine rebounds, Seth Curry scored 17 points and the Sacramento Kings beat the Denver Nuggets 115-106 on Saturday night to sweep the three-game season series....
